mapper.select: SELECT c.COMMENT_ID AS commentId, c.REVIEW_ID AS reviewId, b.APPUSERID AS appUserId, c.CONTENT AS content, c.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, c.UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt, c.PARENT_ID AS parentId FROM COMMENTS c JOIN BUG3 b ON c.APP_USER_ID = b.APPUSERID WHERE c.REVIEW_ID = #{reviewId} ORDER BY NVL(c.PARENT_ID, c.COMMENT_ID), c.CREATED_AT ASC
